hero.subtitle:
Naura Meets — a service for meetings within communities and by interests.
Expand your circle, find your people, get new ideas through regular meetings with interesting people.

how_it_works.title: How Meetings Work
how_it_works.description:
Naura meets is a format of regular meetings with new people.
Every week you decide whether to participate or skip. If you participate, we match you and provide context so the conversation doesn't start from scratch.
how_it_works.card_context_desc: See the participant's profile: what they do, what they're looking for, how they can help
how_it_works.card_rhythm_desc: Participate when convenient — skip a round if you're not ready
how_it_works.card_protection_desc: If you don't connect, we'll find a new match. After the meeting — feedback that we take into account next time

why_meet.title: Why Meet?
why_meet.card1_desc: Meet people you wouldn't usually cross paths with
why_meet.card2_title: Learn How Others Solve Similar Tasks
why_meet.card2_desc: Exchange experience with those going through the same thing
why_meet.card3_title: Find Your People in a New Environment
why_meet.card3_desc: Meet people from adjacent fields or with similar interests
why_meet.card4_desc: Get a fresh perspective, ideas, and contacts that remain after the meeting

week_flow.title: How the Week Goes
week_flow.step1_desc: Receive an invitation to the round — participate or skip
week_flow.step2_desc: See the match's profile, write on Telegram, arrange a meeting
week_flow.step3_desc: Couldn't connect? We'll find a new match for this week
week_flow.step4_desc: Mark if the meeting took place, rate it — we take it into account in future rounds

for_communities.title: Naura Meets for Your Community
for_communities.description: Participants get to know each other, newcomers integrate faster, activity grows along with community value — without your participation.
for_communities.problem_desc: Participants come to events but don't know each other. Newcomers get lost. Silence between meetings. All this eats up engagement, and the community remains formal.
for_communities.solution_desc:
Naura Meets launches regular 1-on-1 meetings within your community.
People meet themselves, you get a tool that works on autopilot.
for_communities.benefit1_desc: Matching, notifications, meeting control — everything works without you
for_communities.benefit2_desc: See who participates, how many meetings took place, what feedback
for_communities.benefit3_desc: Meeting format (online/offline), round frequency, access by groups
for_communities.form_desc: Fill out the form — we will answer and help connect meetings for your community.
for_communities.placeholder_comment: Briefly tell about the format and audience

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.for_participants_item1: Participation in Naura general base — free
pricing.for_participants_item2: Meetings within communities — depends on community settings

faq.title: FAQ
faq.p_q1: What if the match doesn't suit me?
faq.p_a1: If you haven't connected by Wednesday, we'll find a new match. After the meeting, leave feedback, we'll take it into account next time.
faq.p_q2: Can I choose who to meet with?
faq.p_a2: No, the magic of Meets is in randomness! At the same time, we take into account the profile context (sphere, interests, goals) to select the most interesting interlocutors.
faq.p_q3: How often do I need to participate?
faq.p_a3: Every week you receive an invitation — decide for yourself. Skip a round — nothing happens, return when convenient.
faq.b_a1: Setup — 10 minutes. Then everything works automatically.
faq.b_a2: Yes, configure access by groups, meeting format, round frequency.
faq.b_a3: We monitor this: check-in in the middle of the week, possibility of replacing a pair, feedback after the round. You see the statistics.
